meanings.definition: A type of antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed amoxycillin to help fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: I took amoxycillin for a week to get rid of the bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the amoxycillin and ran away!
meanings.sent4: Amoxycillin was like a superhero fighting off the bacterial villains in my body.
meanings.sent5: The amoxycillin worked tirelessly to defeat the bacterial invaders.

meanings.definition: The generic name for the medication commonly known as Amoxil or Trimox.
meanings.sent1: My pharmacist recommended amoxycillin as a more affordable option.
meanings.sent2: Amoxycillin is the same as Amoxil or Trimox, just with a different name.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought too much amoxycillin and now have a lifetime supply!
meanings.sent4: Her medicine cabinet was filled with bottles of amoxycillin, like a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The doctor always prescribes amoxycillin, it's like his go-to medication.
